amendment.description: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to direct the EPA Administrator, in consultation with the U.S. Fire Administration, to submit an annual report to Congress on the effectiveness of the guidance required under Section 18 of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to direct the EPA Administrator, in consultation with the U.S. Fire Administration, to submit an annual report to Congress on the effectiveness of the guidance required under Section 18 of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Golden amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Golden amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Golden.
